name: Black Bean Puree With Cilantro
keywords: black beans, onion, tomato, high fiber, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 tomatoes, peeled, seeded and chopped (fresh or canned)

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer the beans in water to cover with the onion, celery, carrot, tomatoes, garlic, chili, cumin and pepper for one hour. Season to taste with salt. Add more water if necessary and cook until tender.
Puree the beans in two batches with their liquid in a food processor, adding enough of the chicken stock to make a smooth puree. Correct seasoning. Before serving, sprinkle the puree with cilantro.
